name: paper-trading-app
description: A full-stack paper trading web application with real-time simulated market data

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && yarn dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.test: cd backend && yarn test && cd ../frontend && yarn test
scripts.lint: cd backend && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && yarn typecheck && cd ../frontend && yarn typecheck
